item.title: 观看：日本内务省的数据显示，日本 CPI 增长率为 2.0%，低于 12 月份 2.3% 的增长率。
item.description:
WATCH: The 2.0% gain in Japan's CPI was slower than the 2.3% increase in December, internal affairs and communications ministry data showed, underscoring views waning cost-push inflation from commodity imports could ease the pain of higher living costs https://t.co/U73xgwuel0 pic.twitter.com/1yj48uXZdk

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 观看：随着美国对加勒比海和欧洲游轮需求的增长以及成本的相对降低，挪威邮轮公司控股公司表示，预计第一季度将实现盈利。
item.description:

item.title: 雷诺在日内瓦车展上发布了备受期待的新款电动汽车 R5，欧洲汽车业正争相降低成本，推出更多价格低廉、口碑良好的电动汽车，以应对中国廉价车型的到来。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Renault unveiled its highly anticipated new electric R5 at the Geneva Motor Show, as Europe's auto industry scrambled to cut costs and roll out more affordable, well-reviewed electric vehicles to counter the arrival of cheaper Chinese models. More here: https://t.co/s42j1Wwe2d pic.twitter.com/dNiiLPoazM

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 在比特币升至超过 57000 美元后，有迹象表明有大量玩家在购买这种加密货币，比特币也因此创下了两年来的新高。较小的竞争对手以太坊两年来首次突破 3,200 美元。更多信息
item.description:
Bitcoin hit a two-year high after it rose to more than $57,000 on signs of large players buying the cryptocurrency. Smaller rival ether topped $3,200 for the first time in two years. Read more: https://t.co/OEBvMnfTK4 pic.twitter.com/BHsyhzv17Q

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 尽管政府和企业多年来一直在评论缩小男女薪酬差距的问题，但官方数据揭示了澳大利亚一些最大雇主的男女收入差距。更多信息
item.description:
Official data exposes the gulf between what men and women earn at some of Australia's biggest employers, despite years of commentary from governments and corporations about closing the gender pay gap. More here https://t.co/V0uXUC1Cp0 pic.twitter.com/0lIi1aTAYr

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 雷诺在日内瓦车展上发布了备受期待的新款电动车 R5，这款车型的设计灵感直接来源于雷诺 1972 年的畅销车型，这家法国汽车制造商希望它能极大地推动电动车的销售。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Renault unveiled its highly anticipated new electric R5 at the Geneva Motor Show, a model directly inspired by its 1972 bestseller that the French automaker hopes will bring a major boost to its electric vehicle sales. More here: https://t.co/s42j1Wwe2d pic.twitter.com/CHZaWu8UJW

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024
